mapper.select: WITH MY_ORG AS ( SELECT DEPT_ID, POS_ID FROM USER_HR WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} ) SELECT c.CAL_ID AS calId, c.CAL_NAME AS calName, c.COLOR AS color, CASE WHEN c.OWNER_USER_NO = #{userNo} OR c.SCOPE = 'PERSONAL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS isPersonal, CASE WHEN c.OWNER_USER_NO = #{userNo} AND c.SCOPE = 'PERSONAL' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS defaultForMe FROM CALENDAR c LEFT JOIN CALENDAR_MEMBER cm ON cm.CAL_ID = c.CAL_ID AND cm.USER_NO = #{userNo} LEFT JOIN MY_ORG mo ON 1=1 LEFT JOIN CALENDAR_DEPT_SHARE cds ON cds.CAL_ID = c.CAL_ID AND cds.DEPT_ID = mo.DEPT_ID LEFT JOIN CALENDAR_POS_SHARE cps ON cps.CAL_ID = c.CAL_ID AND cps.POS_ID = mo.POS_ID WHERE c.DELETED_YN = 'N' AND ( c.OWNER_USER_NO = #{userNo} OR cm.USER_NO IS NOT NULL OR cds.DEPT_ID IS NOT NULL OR cps.POS_ID IS NOT NULL ) ORDER BY c.CAL_NAME
